General ramblings of socal supermoto

We’re Racing Qualcom this Sunday 8/15!

What are you doing Sunday? Wanna hang out and watch Supermotos go 90mph, then pitch it sideways into some hairpins? The good folks at the San Diego Karting Association have invited us to take part in their Kart races. The day starts at 8am with tech inspection and practice sessions. Supermoto practice sessions will be at 9:45, and 10:45. Heat races and 2pm, and Supermoto mains at 5pm. If you just want to come down and watch it’s $10. We should have a fresh shipment of tshirts and a couple hoodies available as well. If you’ve wanted to check out motorcycle racing in person this would be a close and easy way to do it. There’s gonna be some very fast riders down there. Be sure to swing by the Socal Supermoto Factory Pits (ok tent) and say hi!

Qualcom Parking lot

$10

Sunday 8/15

9am – 5pm

Facebook, because what else are you going to do at work?
